title: LFM - Team Recruiting TOP/MID/JG Players for Ranked 5's

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Moses Il

Highest Rank Achieved: Gold 1 (plat placements went 2/3)

Current SoloQ Rank: Gold 5 (dropped to play with friends)

Role: Mid - usually play control mages (azir and ori being my best) but can also play assassins like zed to a high proficiency

Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Azir, Ori, Tf/zed/Syndra

Skype: yes

Any other Information:  On several occasions with my higher ranked friends i have beaten diamonds in lane and won games while beating people with much higher ranks than me. I'm willing to do try outs and all that and have skype and always keep a good sense of humor. I also have a fairly good ability to shot call and play from deficits.

IGN : Hirari
Role : Top JG
Cuurent Rank : Plat 3
Champion for Top : Irelia Renekton Maokai
Champion for JG : Elise Rek'sai Vi
Skype : Yes

Hi there.

IGN: PvPRealm
Role: Can play any role apart from support with high performance
Current Rank: Gold 5
Top 3 Champions: considering I don't have a main role, and consider myself applicable in all roles, ill list off a few champions I play a lot, Amumu jg, vayne adc, jinx adc, gnar top, azir mid, leblanc mid, anything really, im really versatile
Skype: highly preffered use of contact, do have Skype
Anything else you wish to mention: played for 2 years, peaked at gold 2 this season , definitely willing to get to a high rank and play seriously. add me in game for further talk as to the I guess you could say employment or induction into the team, thanks

ID: Raito
prefer mid or top
GOLD 5 lokking for a team for any team rank

IGN: XSirCution
Role: Mid / JG
CR: Plat 5
Top 3 Champs: {{champion:238}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:157}} (Mid) {{champion:64}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:11}} (JG)
Skype: Ofc
GG

Ingame name: Plate
Role: Jungle/Top
Current Rank: Gold 5
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Lee sin/Elise/Gragas or Olaf/Fiora/Malphite/Renekton/Kennen (basically any meta pick I play)
Skype: Yes
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: Was plat 4 last season then took a large break this season. Came back 2 weeks ago and went on a huge loss streak down to gold 5. Honestly I'm a much better player than Gold 5 but it's hard to carry people that are 0/5 in the first 10 minutes.

Ingame name: ChiefBeanie
Role: Top/Mid/ADC
Current Rank: Platinum 3 (peaked at Platinum 2)
Top 3 Champions In Role (no order required): Top: Malphite, Maokai, Irelia. Mid: Viktor, Orianna, Veigar. ADC: Tristana, Jinx, Sivir
Skype: Yes
Anything Else You Wish To Mention: Can play on Fridays/Saturdays, active all day on those days. Very keen on playing ranked 5s and achieving a good rank for rewards before end of season.{{champion:17}}

Gangsta Duck
Support 
Gold 3 
{{champion:40}} , {{champion:432}}  and {{champion:44}} 
Can Skype

I can also mid with equal skill as in support with my top 3 being {{champion:110}} , {{champion:127}}  and {{champion:143}} . I can pretty much play any champ well and own all of them. Used to be in Plat 5 but had a massive losing streak which spiraled out of control.
